data.name: Neon Cyber Samurai
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to the Fracture, a dimension where everything ever lost throughout time and space can be found.

Neon Cyber Samurai is a futuristic survival game with roguelite elements where you must survive against and defeat ever-increasing waves of foes, steal their strange technology to upgrade yourself, and inevitably fight their leaders in hopes of finding a way to escape this forsaken dimension.

CHOOSE YOUR SAMURAI

Select one of many adventurers dragged into the Fracture from their worlds. Learn their combat styles, understand their weapons of choice and dive into enemy forces with nothing but your skills and the experience you get as you eliminate anyone bold enough to try and stop you.

DISCOVER MYSTERIOUS ARSENAL

Dash, shoot, and slash your enemies to salvage their technology and use it to upgrade yourself. Get faster, grow stronger and evolve your fighting style to uncover combinations of powers and abilities that can turn you into an unstoppable force.

KEY FEATURES

No instructions. No easy way. Start with nothing and discover yourself, meet the enemy face to face, obtain new abilities, grow stronger, and always fight to survive.

data.short_description: Neon Cyber Samurai is a survival game with roguelite elements set in a futuristic world dominated by aliens. Shoot and slash down hordes of foes, steal their weapons, use them to upgrade your Samurai and become an unstoppable force that not even the strongest creatures in this dimension could match.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Version 9.0c

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Mavericks 10.9 or newer
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia 320M or higher, or Radeon HD 2400 or higher, or Intel HD 3000 or higher
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or newer
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia Geforce 8600/9600GT (Driver v331), AMD HD 2xxx-4xxx (Driver mesa 10.5.9), AMD HD 5xxx+ (Driver mesa 10.5.9 or Catalyst 15.7), Intel HD 3000 (Driver mesa 10.6)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card
